FILE: cm436483v11.0.txt
DYAD: NIGER - CHAD
RIVALRY: RIV1060
DISPUTE(S): MID4067 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180702
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180914

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

	
MID4067

TERRMID: MID4067 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID4067 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID4067 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4067 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4067 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4067 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID4067 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4067 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4067 1 -- civil war MID
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4067 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID4067 from Gibler 2018, Chad forces followed rebels into Niger, where Niger opened fire. One Chadian soldier was killed. Coded civil war MID because the conflict resulted from rebels in Chad trying to escape to Niger. 

CIVWARLINK: MID4067 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4067 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID4067 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4067 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4067 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4067 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID3 1993-2001:

MID4067
rivalry=436483 nationa=CHAD nationb=NIGER MID4067 19930218-19930218 
 revtype1a=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=1-25 DEATHS fatalpa=1 lhosta=USE OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0
lhostb=USE OF FORCE 

A Chadian border guard was killed when he (along with several others) crossed into Niger in pursuit of rebels. First and last day of dispute was on 2/18/1993.

RIVNOTES:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
